name: Get Started
section_name: Get started with Isle of Man research.

choices.name: Get started with Isle of Man research.

content.text:
1. Learn about Isle of Man research in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS Wiki:—Isle of Man

  2. Learn about online and library resources in the Isle of Man Family History Society site.

    ☆ The Library and Online Resources

  3. Learn about Manx family history in this article.

    ☆ Introduction to Manx Family History

  4. Learn about Genealogy in the Isle of Man and Channel Islands.

    ☆ EG: Genealogy in the Isle of Man and Channel Islands

choices.name: Explore resources for Isle of Man research.

content.text:
1. Explore records on the ☆Forebears.io site.
  2. Explore the GENUKI site for the Isle of Man.
  3. Explore a variety of resources on the IsleofManFreeAncestry site.
  4. Explore the BillionGraves site for cemetery records in the Isle of Man.
  5. Explore the ☆Find A Grave site for cemetery records in the Isle of Man.
  6. Find historical maps for the Isle of Man on the ☆David Rumsey site.
